page.shortlink: form layout map properties template property
page.description: Defines a custom template for the map control.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Template]* property can be used to define a custom layout for the map control separate from the default template for the FormView control.

section.description: For a visual example watch [this video]. To define a default template for all fields on a form view see the '[Default template]' property on the Form Properties tab.

link.link: Form View Builder Properties/Other Form Properties/Default template Property
